sinks.name: Sink1
sinks.script:
sink(input(
		customer_Id as string,
		DOB as string,
		Gender as string,
		city_code as string,
		Customer_Name as string,
		Created_Modified_Date as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> Sink1

typeProperties.script:
section Section1;
shared input_blob_cust = let
  AdfDoc = AzureStorage.BlobContents("https://chandrablobstorage1.blob.core.windows.net/input/Customer.csv"),
  Csv = Csv.Document(AdfDoc, [Delimiter = ",", Encoding = TextEncoding.Utf8, QuoteStyle = QuoteStyle.Csv]),
  PromotedHeaders = Table.PromoteHeaders(Csv, [PromoteAllScalars = true])
in
  PromotedHeaders;
shared UserQuery = let
  Source = input_blob_cust,
  #"Removed columns" = Table.RemoveColumns(Source, {"Column6"})
in
  #"Removed columns";
